commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew: /** * Creates a CharArraySet from a file resource associated with a class. (See * {@link Class#getResourceAsStream(String)}). * * @param ignoreCase * true if the set should ignore the case of the * stopwords, otherwise false * @param aClass * a class that is associated with the given stopwordResource * @param resource * name of the resource file associated with the given class * @param comment * comment string to ignore in the stopword file * @return a CharArraySet containing the distinct stopwords from the given * file * @throws IOException * if loading the stopwords throws an {@link IOException} */ protected static CharArraySet loadStopwordSet(final boolean ignoreCase, final Class aClass, final String resource, final String comment) throws IOException { final Set wordSet = WordlistLoader.getWordSet(aClass, resource, comment); final CharArraySet set = new CharArraySet(Version.LUCENE_31, wordSet.size(), ignoreCase); set.addAll(wordSet); return set; }
